net.jawr.web.taglib.jsf

Class AbstractResourceBundleTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.component.UIComponent
      • javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase
        • javax.faces.component.UIOutput
          • net.jawr.web.taglib.jsf.AbstractResourceBundleTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.component.ValueHolder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSSBundleTag, JavascriptBundleTag

    public abstract class AbstractResourceBundleTag
extends javax.faces.component.UIOutput
    Abstract implementation of a facelets taglib component which will retrieve a Jawr config object from the servlet context and use it to render bundles of resources according to its src attribute.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi
